data.message: Like seriously, Eminem is my favorite, but y'all are worshiping this dude.

replies.message: Real. is easily see but hard. to find
Haha, like I'm afraid of a freaking 13 year old faggot.
we worship him because hes rap god

You're freaking stupid. He's just a man. I see why y'all worship him though. Because he's white and he can rap really good. Get off Em's dick, and go listen to people like Rakim, Big L, Wu-Tang Clan, Tech N9ne, Dizzy Wright, Big Pun, and every other great name to touch down in Hip-hop and see that some rappers are better than Eminem, and MC's are even greater than your "rap god". As much as I like Eminem (the classic one), you fans (Stan's) make it too hard to be an Eminem fan.
